name: Cannonhead Alpha Build
description:
Jump, and blast your way through 3 levels of fun, hunting down crystals and blasting enemies. There are also some hidden golden targets. Think you can find them all?

CONTROLS:

INPUTACTIONMouse
WASD
Space
Left Mouse Click
'P' KeyCamera
Move
Jump
Shoot
Pause

Developer's Note: This is an Alpha Build of a game that I have kinda shelved for a long while. My creative flow's been slow and shallow, but I would like to show you guys this little game that I've cobbled together.
